news-global-econ.title: I’ve been a pastor for 40 years. Young men are struggling and I think I know why
news-global-econ.description: Traditional male formation systems collapsed, leaving young men vulnerable to radicalization and mental health struggles to help cope with loneliness.

news-global-econ.description: Iranians around the world – and, according to some reports, within Iran – celebrated on Saturday following confirmation America had launched "Operation Epic Fury" against Iranian regime targets and, President Donald Trump later confirmed, killed Ayatollah Ali…

news-global-econ.title: Stephen Moore: Cutting Government Spending Is Key to Lowering Interest Rates, Not the Fed
news-global-econ.description: On Friday’s broadcast of Newsmax TV’s “Carl Higbie Frontline,” former Trump Economic Adviser Stephen Moore said that he wants to see lower interest rates, but getting that primarily depends on cutting government spending, not actions from the Federal Reserve.…

news-global-econ.title: Bitcoin recovers above $68,000 after death of Iranian leader
news-global-econ.description: Bitcoin surges past $68,000 following the death of Iran's supreme leader, amid geopolitical tensions and market recovery.

news-global-econ.title: Mark Levin: We Americans must come to grips — we have a party that hates the country
news-global-econ.description: Fox News host Mark Levin breaks down why it was crucial to take military action against the Iranian regime on 'Hannity.'

news-global-soc.title: Theologian bishop says AOC pushed culture aside in heated response to Marco Rubio speech
news-global-soc.description: Bishop Robert Barron exposes the "Karl Marx playbook" after the AOC called Western culture "thin" in response to Marco Rubio's Senate speech.

news-global-soc.title: Sustained war with Iran could drain US missile stockpiles, test escalation control
news-global-soc.description: U.S. officials say limited military strike against Iran is feasible, but sustained conflict complicated by missile defense shortages from Ukraine.

news-global-soc.title: Argentina's Javier Milei Celebrates Death of Ayatollah Ali Khamenei
news-global-soc.description:
President of Argentina Javier Milei celebrated the death of Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, describing him Sunday as "one of the most evil, violent, and cruel people in the history of mankind."

news-global-soc.description:
President Donald Trump confirmed on Saturday evening that the "supreme leader" of Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, was dead after an American and Israeli bombing campaign targeted Tehran this weekend.

news-global-soc.title: Iran strikes disrupt thousands of flights; Dubai Airport damaged
news-global-soc.description: Tens of thousands have been stranded as the region functions as a global superconnector, linking any two points on the planet with one single stop in airports like Dubai, Doha or Abu Dhabi
